name: ext_R5_MedicationKnowledge_storageGuideline
title: Cross-version Extension for R5.MedicationKnowledge.storageGuideline for use in FHIR R4
description: This cross-version extension represents MedicationKnowledge.storageGuideline from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/MedicationKnowledge|5.0.0 for use in FHIR R4.

element.short: How the medication should be stored
element.definition: Information on how the medication should be stored, for example, refrigeration temperatures and length of stability at a given temperature.

constraint.human: All FHIR elements must have a @value or children
Must have either extensions or value[x], not both

element.short: Setting or value of environment for adequate storage
element.definition: Describes a setting/value on the environment for the adequate storage of the medication and other substances.  Environment settings may involve temperature, humidity, or exposure to light.
